data: `minecraft:armor` determines the amount of protection you have in your armor item.
`minecraft:armor` requires the Holiday Creator Features experimental toggle to be set to `true` in order to function properly.

>Holiday Creator Features contains experimental gameplay features. As with all experiments, you may see additions, removals, and changes in functionality in Minecraft versions without significant advanced warning.
>To learn more about Experimental Features, please visit [Experimental Features in Minecraft: Bedrock Edition](../../../../../Documents/ExperimentalFeaturesToggle.md)

data.Name: Protection
data.Description: How much protection does the armor item have.

data.Name: texture_type
data.Description: Texture Type to apply for the armor.

data: Listed below are the accepted values that can be used for texture_typeL
When making horse armor, you are restricted to leather, iron, gold, or diamond.
